breakthroughPP.players

Class PlayerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • breakthroughPP.players.PlayerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Setting

    public class PlayerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements Setting
    Factory that creates players based on their types

    Georg-August University Goettingen APP breakthroughPP SoSe 2016

    Author:
    Haseeb Sabar Anar

      • getInstance

        public static PlayerFactory getInstance()
        Get the unique instance (singleton) of the player factory.
        Returns:
        the type of the player
        See Also:
        PlayerType

      • create

        public Player create(IOTransfer inouts,
            PlayerType playerType,
            int color)
              throws PlayerException
        Create a player instance of a type specified in the parameters of this function
        Parameters:
        inouts - Used to initialize the player (e.g. input)
        playerType - choosen type, see below.
        color - color of the player
        Returns:
        the player which type was selected.
        Throws:
        PlayerException - if in invalid player type was selected.
        See Also:
        AdvancedPlayer, AIPlayer, InterActivePlayer, RandomPlayer
